rules_text: Create a 3/3 green and black Insect creature token.

Legacy [i](You may play this side of this card only from your graveyard. Exile it if it would be put into a graveyard or not resolve.)[/i]
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
